channel.title: How do i remove coulerd chat through client?
channel.description: its practicly all in the title i was just wondering how i would go about doing this because i beleve it is related to a problem i am having and i was just wondering how i would remove this or even what file i would look at

item.title: How do i remove coulerd chat through client?
item.dc:creator: @smeego smeego
item.description:
@smeego wrote:

i can’t seem to find it , if it helps when i send the message it’s not just my message alone that is white its my name also tho it doesnt show up white before i send the message just after, it only started doing this after i followed this tutorial adding coulers to this server

tutorial i followed - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,528486.0.html

picture of what i mean…

item.title: How do i remove coulerd chat through client?
item.dc:creator: @smeego smeego
item.description:
@smeego wrote:

[quote=“TheLetterQArousesMe, post:4, topic:430640”][quote author=smeego link=topic=533315.msg3898494#msg3898494 date=1327539935]
no no no i mean this client sets your chat couler to white, i was just wondering how i would go about removing it so it goes back to the default yellow, its a delta based client
[/quote]
Post to client section and ill help[/quote]

okay dokie
